space.gui.pipeline

Class ModelFlyweight

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.gui.pipeline.ModelFlyweight

  • public class ModelFlyweight
extends java.lang.Object
    The set of models that are required for the rendering and a mapping from each objects type string to that mode. ModelFlyweight also loads the textures used by the room model.
    Author:
    Simon Pinfold (300280028)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelFlyweight()
      Create the mapping to moodels and load the models into memory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ModelFlyweight

        public ModelFlyweight()
        Create the mapping to moodels and load the models into memory. This is an expensive operation and need only be done once for a GameRenderer instance.

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
